item.title: About
item.description:
Jonatan Kronander

Sternwartstrasse 7, 8092 Zürich, Switzerland || jonatan@kronander.se

Education

2021-2025 (expected)
PhD, Biomedical Image Computing; ETH Zürich, Switzerland
PhD student at Biomedical Image Computing, member of the Computer Vision Laboratory at the Department of Information Technology and Electrical Engineering.
2015-2020
Msc, Electrical Engineering; Lund University, Sweden
Graduate student at Lunds Tekniska Högskola (LTH) with specialisation “Imaging and Graphics”. Engaged in students sports society, Lund formula student and electrical engineering society (E-guild) as extracurricular activities.

Experience

Autumn 2020
Scientific Assistant; ETH Zürich, Switzerland
Research assistant at Biomedical Image Computing.
Summer 2018
Summer Engineering Intern; Axis Communications, Lund, Sweden
Summer internship in the electronic development department.
2015 & 2016
Summer Internship; Sectra Na, Shelton, CT, USA
Two-year recurring summer internship. Visiting several different departments, including customer support, IT services, economy and market.
2011-2015
Acting Restaurant Manager; McDonald’s, Linköping, Sweden
Restaurants youngest manager ever with responsibility for the entire restaurant with budget, P&L and 80 subordinates.

Miscellaneous

Like

  • Coffee
  • Hiking, camping and skitouring
  • Sailing

Languages

  • Swedish, C2
  • English, C1
  • German, B1

Publications

Maybe one day it will be something interesting here…

  • Jonatan Kronander. Semi-supervised lesion detection via image restoration, 2020. Student Paper. (https://lup.lub.lu.se/student-papers/search/publication/9027679)
